input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Michael: Maggie, can I borrow your notes for history? I'll return them tomorrow.
Elizabeth: Sorry, but I usually go to the cafeteria and review them. Why not copy them in the library?
Michael: OK.
Elizabeth: Here you are.
Michael: You are a great help, Maggie.
Elizabeth: I don't quite understand a why you need my notes, Mark? You haven't missed any classes.
Michael: To be honest, I work in supermarket from 7 to 10 o'clock every evening.
Elizabeth: I see. So you're pretty tired when you come to class.
Michael: That's exactly why I want to borrow your notes. My notes aren't very good.
Elizabeth: So what do you usually do in class?
Michael: I'm always awake at the beginning, but thirty minutes after class begins I feel sleepy and have trouble keeping my eyes open.
Elizabeth: Well, I need someone to study with and you need someone to keep you awake. Can we be study partners?
Michael: Oh sure. That's a good idea. So give me a push when you see me sleeping in class.
Elizabeth: OK. Let's start today in the library. We are going there anyway and I don't have to go to the cafeteria.
Michael: Sounds good.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Mary is tired because of finding jobs in the market. Sherlock suggests Mary apply for jobs on the Internet and says she could place her information on the Job Wanted channel on a recruitment web. Mary will try at once.
input_text.Response B: Mark wants to borrow Maggie's class notes. Maggie suggests Mark copy them in the library and invites him to be study partners.
